blocks.headline: TinaCMS + Hugo = ❤️
blocks.text: Harness the strength of Markdown and Git to enhance your Hugo projects with TinaCMS.

blocks.content:
## Bring TinaCMS into Your Hugo Workflow

Integrate TinaCMS into your Hugo projects and enjoy the advantages of markdown content, shortcodes support, and Git-backed version control.

items.headline: Markdown Support
items.text: Easily create and manage content with Markdown, a format perfectly suited for Hugo. TinaCMS simplifies the process and enhances productivity.

items.headline: Shortcodes Support
items.text: Leverage the power of shortcodes for your Hugo site. With TinaCMS, you can configure shortcodes to meet the specific needs of your project.

items.headline: Git-Backed Version Control
items.text: With TinaCMS, all your content is stored in Git, providing the best version control system. This makes tracking changes and managing different versions a breeze.

items.headline: Open Source Frontend
items.text: TinaCMS's frontend is open-source, enabling you to adapt the CMS to your specific needs and benefiting from regular community-driven updates.

items.headline: Amazing Developer Experience
items.text: TinaCMS enhances the developer experience with a seamless local development workflow. Changes to content and schema can be merged in a single commit.

items.headline: Flexible and Customizable
items.text: TinaCMS offers a high level of flexibility and customization options, allowing you to shape your Hugo project to fit your unique requirements.

blocks.headline: Boost Your Hugo Project
blocks.text: Experience the benefits of TinaCMS for your Hugo workflow.

seo.title: TinaCMS + Hugo: Enhance Your Workflow
seo.description: Bring the power of Markdown, shortcodes, and Git into your Hugo projects with TinaCMS. Experience a seamless, highly customizable content management solution.
